org.nd4j.parameterserver.node

Class ParameterServerNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.parameterserver.node.ParameterServerNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ParameterServerNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Integrated node for running the parameter server. This includes the status server, media driver, and parameter server subscriber

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Pass in the media driver used for communication and a defualt status port of 9000
